org.sql: SELECT organizations.* FROM organizations INNER JOIN organization_memberships ON organizations.id = organization_memberships.organization_id WHERE organization_memberships.user_id = "$1" AND organizations.id = "$2"

rewrites.sql: SELECT organizations.* FROM organizations INNER JOIN organization_memberships ON organizations.id = organization_memberships.organization_id WHERE organization_memberships.user_id = "$1" AND organizations.id = "$2" LIMIT 1
